text: Egh nɨ Godɨn Dɨpenim okarizir danganir dɨvazir ekiamɨn aven itim, an apanan markɨ. God Kantrin Igharazibar Gumaziba danganir uari akuvir kam me ganɨngi. Eghtɨ marazi izɨ Jerusalem dɨkɨ mangɨ 42 plan iakɨnibar tugham. Kamaghɨn, nɨ anetakigh.(11:2) Akar Mogomem 11:2ɨn faragha itir akam, nɨ Aposelbar Ingangaribar 21:30ɨn gan. Akar Mogomem 11:2ɨn akar igharazir kam, 42 plan iakɨniba, da 1,260 plan dughiaba, o 3 plan azeniba gɨvazɨma uam akuam. Da 42 plan iakɨniba ko magh ghue. Nɨ Daniel 7:25 ko 12:7ɨn gan. Nɨ akar Kantrin Igharazibar Gumaziba Jerusalem dɨkabɨrazimɨn gansɨva Luk 21:24ɨn gan.
